name: Invisible Infiltration
description:
Invisible Infiltration is a top-down stealth game in which you are able to use your superpowers to become completely invisible and infiltrate enemy bases at will. But such superpowers come at a price, that is, you will start snoring after using your superpowers. How to successfully complete the mission before the enemy is attracted to your snoring?

How to Play

Basic movement: W A S D

Become invisible:  F

Execute: Space

Group Member:

Zhihao sun, Sizhong Li, Ruilin Lan

Some sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com and Pixabay
